text: @realDonaldTrump ARE YOU REALLY AS CRAZY AS YOU SOUND? Or is this simply a desperate attempt to redirect from the second failure after your COVID-19 debacle?... go ahead, Tweet shallow messages. We all know that you shallowly think only DIVISION AND SUPPRESSION can get you re-elected. #vote
